knimeNode.name: Column Selection
knimeNode.shortDescription: Takes a data table and returns a variable with the selected column name.

intro.p: Takes a data table and returns a variable with the selected column name. The selection can also be controlled from a quickfrom (WebPortal).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web port.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If the setting should be hidden in the wizard execution.
If the setting should be hidden in the sub node dialog.
Parameter identifier for external parameterization (e.g. batch execution).
The column that is selected by default.

ports.outPort: Variable output (string) with the selected column name.
